MAIN_MESSAGE: There is a power cut in the EH3 postcode area of Edinburgh. We are aware of multiple power cuts in your area today and we apologise for this. Repairs are taking longer than expected because of the extent of the work required outside 10 Belview Road and our team are now working to get your power back on as quickly and as safely as possible by 8:30pm. We will update this message if this information changes. We apologise for the inconvenience and thank you for your patience. This message was updated at 5:36pm on Monday, 15th February 2021
